description: Try our easy to follow Salmon Tostada recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Taco,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Avocado,Dairy free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Salmon Tostada Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill over medium-high heat. Spray corn with oil and place on grill. Cook for 10 minutes or until charred all over. Cool
Meanwhile, roughly chop half of the coriander and combine with tomato, avocado, onion, oil and lemon juice. Remove kernels from corn, add to bowl and season. Toss to combine.
Reheat chargrill over medium-high heat. Cook tortillas for 1 minute on each side or until charred. Transfer to a plate and cover with foil.

Sprinkle taco seasoning over salmon fillets. Chargrill for 2-3 minutes each side or until cooked to your liking. Flake salmon. Top tortillas with lettuce, corn salad, salmon and remaining coriander. Serve with lime.
